result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Eric W Morehead

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Eric W Morehead in court with attorney Carolyn Hillery Delery.  Jennifer C. Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State is offering that def. plea to Ct. 1 and Ct. 2  and the balance of the charges to be are to be DRI  State recommends Judge follow the PSI  Def. Plea G to counts 1 and 2 on 15CF1480.  The balance of the charges are DRI.  Judge conducts the plea colloquey. Defendant is found Guilty  BTC: PSI ordered.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for April 5, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Eric W Morehead in court with attorney Carolyn Hillery Delery.  Defendant Eric W Morehead in custody.  Brian Van Schyndel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.  Order to consolidate w felony is signed.  Status conference scheduled for January 12, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Eric W Morehead in court with attorney Carolyn Hillery Delery.  Defendant Eric W Morehead in custody.  Lillian V. Lewis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.  Will be consolidating.  Status conference scheduled for December 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Pre-Trial Conference and Order/case adjourned off the record.

Defendant Eric W Morehead in court.  Robin K. Green for Bridget Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.  Eligible for SPD.  Status conference scheduled for August 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Eric W Morehead in court.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Maggie Techert.  Wants ct appt'd atty.  Status conference scheduled for August 4, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on July 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  You have been ordered to have your fingerprints/photographs taken as a condition of your bond.  Report to the Sheriff's Office Records Bureau. Hours:  Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursday between 9:00 a.m. and 11:00 a.m. or between 1:00 p.m. and 4:00 p.m.  No contact with the victim, TH (person, property, residence or family).   No contact with Destiny House Adult Family Home.   Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Eric W Morehead in court.  Brian Van Schyndel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Status conference scheduled for July 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.
